title: misc: cgo/gmp/pi.go is missing copyright notice
body:
In the 'go' repository, misc/cgo/gmp/pi.go is missing a copyright notice and instead embeds a copy of what looks like part of a typical BSD license, which refers to a non-existent copyright notice.

Since this file was contributed by the Go authors, it would be preferable if it had the same copyright header and notice as all other Go files (to simplify the life of distributors).
